short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generate up to 20 business ideas based on selected text on a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generate up to 20 business ideas based on selected text on a webpage. Just select the text and click on the extension icon, from 12 to 20 business ideas will appear, you can use them without any restrictions.
